dialogue: So besides just being able to [color=yellow]glide[/color] with your wings, I bet if you were to [color=yellow]let yourself fall for a bit[/color], give your wings a break.

You might be able to [color=yellow]catch the updraft when you re-extend them again[/color] and maybe even [color=yellow]gain some more height![/color] Try it out and see if you can reach further by doing that!
